general.exactDefinition:
The aim of the workshop is to provide advice and guidance on the European Commissions’ Green Deal Policy and the green recovery to participants from all DG NEAR Regions. Representatives of European Commission Directorates General will explain the objectives of the policy and how their implementation is being planned and supported. 
The provision of this information is intended to ensure that DG NEAR’s beneficiary and partner countries are fully informed of the nature and implications of the green deal and green recovery. This will allow them to utilise this information in order to align themselves where agreed or where needed, with the direction that is being taken and the legislation that has been and will be implemented in order to achieve the desired outcome of making Europe the first climate-neutral Continent by 2050.
general.backgroundInfo: The experts from the beneficiaries countries have requested assistance in selected topic. Beneficiaries usualy have no adequate legislation or the national legislative framework is not implemented. Beneficiaries have lack of the financial and professional capacities. The aim is to assist with information on current EU legislative framework related to the waste management in circular economy, to exchange experiences and to share information how to prepare national legislative framework and how to enforce it.
general.ecMeasure: The Green Deal and Green Recovery
general.applicant: Representatives from all three NEAR Regions dealing with the Green Deal and Green Recovery. Colleagues working in the EU delegations covering the  Green Deal and Green Recovery.

logistics.feeComment:
No FDAs to speakers as all of them are internal EC colleagues. 
Up to 20 Pax per beneficiary to be invited, plus 5 from each EU delegation; latter incuded under speakers. 
Also need English/Turkish interpretation but cannot include it in selected languages.
logistics.comment:
Single Source Procurement of the Beyond Platform for this event has been agreed by HoU. Recording of the event in the 5 languages is also required. 
Draft agenda is uploaded, timing may need to change. 
Four addenda are needed to invite i) the speakers ii) the participants from IPA iii) the participants from ENI East iv) the participants from ENI South.
